posts.post_title: Completed Listing  (was Prewar type cards t222,t204,t207,e101
posts.post_content:
All cards have found new addresses, Thanks everyone for the interest! 

At risk of being designated only as a hoarder, I'm offering up some low-grade types from the box of oddball stuff I have.
 
Scans included here can be redone larger if needed. Sorry they don't seem to line up together:o
Prices include basic shipping.
Take all 4 for a discount.
Paypal is fine, and preferred. Prices lessified on Feb 6th.
 
Email if you would like more information or discuss transaction details:familytoad at comcast dot net
 
T204-Wagner SGC 10 -sold, thanks Brian!
T222- Bush - sold, thanks Kyle!
E101- Doyle-no longer available
T207 Recruit -Latham- no longer available

Lessification Bump & Update, one sold, one fell through...

Ramly T204 H.Wagner-$90 
E101 Doyle-$35
T207 Latham-$35

$150 bundle...
Dave, Arlie willl be on his way Tuesday when the P.O opens!
